name: ASUS Vivobook S 15 OLED 15.6" Copilot+ PC Laptop - Cool Silver (Snapdragon X Elite/32GB RAM/1TB SSD)
specs: Perfectly Built for AI, the ASUS Vivobook S 15 OLED delivers robust performance tailored for multitasking enthusiasts. It's powered by the Snapdragon X Elite X1E 78 100 processor with Qualcomm Adreno Graphics, exceptional AI capabilities boasting up to 75 total TOPs, and Wi-Fi 7 providing speeds up to 4.8 times faster than the previous generation.

Microsoft Copilot in Windows 11 makes complex tasks simple. Get answers, generate images, summarize texts, and more! Unleash your creativity with the power of intelligent assistance. Featuring the ASUS Copilot key allows you dive into Windows AI-powered tools with just one press

Experience unparalleled portability with a slim profile starting at just 14.7mm (0.58 inches) thin and a lightweight all-metal chassis weighing only 1.42 kg (3.13 lb). Keep your stress levels low with all-day battery life powered by Fast-Charge technology

Ultra-vivid 15.6” 3K (2880 x 1620) 120Hz ASUS Lumina OLED display makes every moment incredible, with its up to 600-nit peak HDR brightness, a 16:9 aspect ratio, Immerse yourself in visuals with 89% screen-to-body ratio
The MIL-STD 810H military standard ensures unmatched reliability in harsh conditions. This rigorous testing enhances longevity, ensuring your laptop is ready for work, travel, or relaxation
Whatever you’re listening to, the powerful, crystal-clear sound delivered by the Super-linear speakers, Smart Amplifier, and Dolby Atmos will give your ears a treat

The ASUS Vivobook S 15 OLED includes all the essential full-function ports you need for fast and seamless on-the-go connections with 2 USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, 2 USB 4 Gen 3 Type-C supports display/power delivery, a HDMI 2.1 TMDS, a Combo Audio Jack and a Micro SD card reader so you don’t have to carry annoying dongles and adapters
ASUS AI noise cancellation employs machine learning to isolate unwanted noise from human speech, ensuring an enhanced communication experience and improved conferencing quality
Elevate your user experience with a 180-degree hinge, allowing you to effortlessly adjust the screen angle to suit your comfort and needs
Single-zone RGB backlit keyboard subtly enhances your style, while the super-large touchpad improves mouse-free navigation and workspace efficiency.
For an unrivaled input experience, it also featured an FHD infrared (IR) camera to unlock your laptop quickly and securely

name: Samsung Galaxy Book4 Edge 16" Touchscreen Copilot+ PC Laptop (Snapdragon X Elite/16GB RAM/512GB SSD/Windows 11)
specs: Transform all you do — and how you do it — with Samsung Galaxy Book4 Edge. This first Galaxy AI-powered PC features an innovative Snapdragon X Elite processor that powers industry-leading intelligence. Unlock higher levels of productivity, communication, creativity, and more. Embrace the power and possibilities of Galaxy AI with Galaxy Book4 Edge.
Galaxy Book4 Edge revolutionizes your PC experience with intuitive Galaxy AI-powered features right at your fingertips
Seamlessly interact with your other compatible Galaxy devices using Magical Device Control to activate features like Second Screen and Multi Control with simple prompts

Searching for a document, email or web page on your PC? Now you can just describe how you remember something and Recall will find it, instantly. Just provide a short description of what you remember and let your PC do the rest
Controlling your phone is now easier too — call, text, set reminders and more from the convenience of your PC
From international webinars to chatting with others overseas, get accurate subtitles in real time with automatic Live Captions that translate 44 languages into English
And when you’re feeling creative, light your spark with Paint Cocreator and amplify your artwork on the stunning 3K AMOLED touchscreen display

name: MicrosoftMicrosoft Surface Pro (LCD) Copilot+ PC 13" 256GB Tablet with Snapdragon X Plus/16GB RAM (2024) - Platinum - Device Only
specs: *Keyboard sold separately. The Microsoft Surface Pro unlocks a new way to think about a laptop. Get the most out of your day with accelerated performance that unlocks a new AI era to enable Copilot experiences, and battery life to keep you going all-day long. Ultra-portable design can replace your tablet, your laptop, and does more than you could ever imagine.
Copilot+PC: A new era of AI. The fastest, most intelligent Surface ever
Experience ultra-fast speeds and next-gen capabilities by a powerful AI accelerator and an all-new processor for ultimate multitasking
Unrivalled flexibility: Industry-leading performance in an ultra-flexible design with its iconic 165-degree fluid kickstand
Your AI sidekick accelerated: Search for what you need with natural language, whether you saw it, sent it, or saved it across any platform and let Recall find it, instantly
Stay connected anywhere: Ultra-fast speeds anywhere with wireless Wi-Fi 7 and optional 5G connections
All day battery life: 14 hours of battery life and less down-time charging, supports fast charging with minimum 65W PSU via Surface Connect or USB-C
AI-enhanced Studio Camera: HD front and rear cameras with AI-enhanced features for perfect lighting and clear sound
Design for sustainability: 2-in-1 device available with recycled aluminum and more replaceable components

Equipped with Intel Core i5-12450HX processor and 16GB DDR5 RAM, it lets you manage daily tasks and offers unmatched gaming performance. Intel Core i5-12450HX processor and 16GB DDR5 RAM combine to deliver a highly efficient and reliable performance
512GB solid state drive provides more space for your files, media, and applications
15.6-inch touchscreen with 1920 x 1080 native screen resolution provides crisp and clear pictures
Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax) 2 x 2 and Bluetooth 5.1 offer reliable options for wireless connectivity
Lithium-polymer battery with 60mAh capacity makes you worry less about frequent recharging and related hassles
Three USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type A ports, one USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type C (10Gbps, PD 140W, DP 1.4), and headphone/mic combo give you more options for connecting external devices

Slim profile improves portability

name: ASUS TUF Gaming F17 17.3" Gaming Laptop - Mecha Grey (Intel Core i5-12500H/1TB SSD/16GB RAM/GeForce RTX 3050)
specs: Enter the fray with confidence using the ASUS TUF Gaming F17 laptop. This laptop features a 12th Gen Intel Core i5-12500H processor and a 16GB of high-speed DDR4 RAM to ensure effortless streaming and multitasking capabilities. Its 1TB SSD speeds-up loading times and the GeForce RTX 30 Series GPU with a dedicated MUX Switch ensures optimal gaming performance.
12th Gen Intel Core i5-12500H processor with 2.5GHz speed ensures swift and responsive performance for enhanced gaming
16GB of DDR4-3,200MHz RAM guarantees improved multitasking capabilities and faster data processing
1TB of PCIe 3.0 solid state drive offers ample storage space, ensuring rapid access to data and faster loading times
NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 laptop GPU with a 95W Max TGP delivers smooth and immersive gaming experiences with high frame rates and stunning visual fidelity
17.3-inch FHD (1920 x 1080) 144Hz display with Adaptive-Sync synchronizes with the GPU's output to assure fast-paced gaming without any motion blur or stuttering

10/100/1000 Ethernet, Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax) (dual band) 2x2 and Bluetooth 5.2 wireless card ensure lightning-fast and reliable connectivity to provide seamless internet access and enhanced device compatibility

One Thunderbolt 4 support DisplayPort, one USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C support DisplayPort / G-SYNC, two USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, one HDMI 2.0b, one RJ45 LAN port, and one 3.5mm combo audio jack for versatile connectivity with a wide range of devices and peripherals
Upgraded pair of 84-blade Arc Flow Fans provide better heat dissipation and maintain optimal operating temperatures during intense gaming sessions
MUX Switch enhances laptop gaming performance by 5-10% by efficiently routing frames directly from the dedicated GPU to the display, bypassing the integrated GPU
Backlit keyboard enhances visibility, allowing you to type comfortably even in low-light conditions
720p HD camera allows for high-definition video calls and conferences
Meets the MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard for ensuring durability and reliability in challenging environments
Preloaded with Windows 11 Home that offers user-friendly interface, enhanced productivity tools, and robust security measures

Arc Flow fans boost cooling performance without causing extra noise
MUX Switch significantly enhances gaming performance along with Advanced Optimus technology by automatically toggling between discrete GPU and integrated GPU based on tasks, improving battery life
